text: Boquio is a small upland area south of Bolitho in west Cornwall, England, United Kingdom.Ordnance Survey: Landranger map sheet 203 Land's End It is situated approximately halfway between Praze-an-Beeble and Wendron in the civil parish of Wendron. There are several farmstead settlements bearing the names Boquio and Boquio Vean in the area. ==References== Category:Hamlets in Cornwall
title: Boquio
